text: Bellecourt is a surname, and may refer to: *Clyde Bellecourt (born 1936), Native American rights activist *George-Antoine Bellecourt (1803–1874), Canadian priest and missionary *Gustave Duchesne de Bellecourt (1817–1881), 19th century French diplomat who was active in Asia *Sylvie Bouchet Bellecourt (born 1957), French politician *Vernon Bellecourt (1931–2007), Native American rights activist == See also == * Belle Court Apartments * Belcourt of Newport * Bell Court, Lexington * Bellicourt, France Category:Surnames Category:French-language surnames Category:Surnames of French origin Category:Native American families Category:Native American surnames
title: Bellecourt
